faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How accurate is the AI triage system?
faq.a1: Our system achieves 95.3% concordance with senior emergency department nurses and has been validated across 50+ healthcare facilities.
faq.a2: Typical deployment takes less than 2 weeks, including EMR integration, staff training, and system configuration.
faq.q3: Does it replace nurses or support them?
faq.a3: My Doctor is designed to support and enhance clinical decision-making, not replace healthcare professionals. It provides evidence-based recommendations that nurses and physicians use to make final decisions.
faq.a4: Currently supports Arabic, English, and French with additional languages in development.
faq.q5: Is patient data secure and compliant?
faq.a5: Yes, we are HIPAA compliant, GDPR compliant, and certified by regional authorities including Saudi FDA and UAE Ministry of Health.
faq.q6: Can it integrate with our existing EMR?
faq.a6: Yes, we support integration with all major EMR systems including Epic, Cerner, and HL7 FHIR-compliant systems.
faq.a7: We provide comprehensive on-site and remote training for all staff levels, including ongoing support and refresher sessions.
faq.q8: How is the AI continuously improved?
faq.a8: Our system uses reinforcement learning from clinician feedback, regular updates based on latest medical guidelines, and continuous validation against clinical outcomes.
